divs: sighting detailsapprox 0140 mtn time in my hot tub, glendale az 85304: object in clear skies seen for approx five-seven seconds traveling at very high rate of speed from a southwest to north easterly direction. object appeared diamond shaped\ faint and speed was mostly consistent though in this time frame it appeared to have gained speed for the short time witnessed. being the faint and non streaking display it assumed and the fact that i have witnessed other ufo phenomena before i knew it was a good far distance in the atmosphere. i would have judged with time frame, arms apart distance, and previous ufo experience from michigan great lakes event to have been anywhere covering 200 miles to 500 miles in this short span. unlike previous witnessed phenomenons this event followed a straight line. glendale az, 85304 approx 0140 mtn standard
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Glendale
There were no other sightings in Glendale on or around April 3rd 2012
Summary: quick witness, no directional change, triangle shaped and seemed to have gained speed in 5-7 second time fame and fade in atmosphere
